'''Xinxiu''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Teyvat]] storyline [[Archon Quests]], Chapter II, Prologue: [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]]. She is a spectator during the finals of [[The Crux Clash]].
